## Major updates {.unnumbered}
::: {.callout-note}
This year's version features the following **major** updates:

- Second full rewrite of the workbook using `Quarto`.
- Fully updated geodemographics content drawing on the [London Output Area Classification](https://doi.org/10.1177/23998083241242913).
- Updated accesibility analysis content using [Overture Point of Interest data](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/full/10.1177/23998083241263124).
:::
